薦筵: (こもむしろ) - mat of woven wild rice leaves
薦被り: (こもかぶり) - cask wrapped in straw matting; beggar
薦骨: (せんこつ) - sacrum/sacral bone; (仙骨 only) hermitry/appearance of an hermit/unworldliness/unusual physique/outstanding appearance
薨ずる: (こうずる) - to die (of a nobleman, etc.)
薨去: (こうきょ) - death (esp. nobleman, aristocrat); demise
薩摩: (さつま) - Satsuma (ancient province located in present-day Kagoshima prefecture); sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas)
薩摩の守: (さつまのかみ) - traveling while deliberately not paying a fare (travelling)
薩摩スティック: (サツマスティック) - sweet potato fries
薩摩揚げ: (さつまあげ) - deep-fried ball of fish paste
薩摩汁: (さつまじる) - miso soup with pork or chicken (originally boned chicken chunks) with daikon, carrots, great burdock or sweet potatoes; meat chowder
薩摩琵琶: (さつまびわ) - Satsuma biwa (or its music)
薩英戦争: (さつえいせんそう) - Anglo-Satsuma War
薪: (canela/takigi) - fuel , firewood, kindling, fuel; piece(s) of firewood
薪を抱いて火を救う: (たきぎをいだいてひをすくう) - having one's good intentions backfire dangerously; causing harm when trying to prevent it; trying to put out a fire while carrying kindling
薪割り: (makiwari) - machadinha, machado; corte de madeira, fender madeira
薪水: (しんすい) - fuel and water/firewood and water; gathering firewood and drawing water/kitchen work/housework
薪水の労: (しんすいのろう) - (usu. as 薪水の労をとる) menial services (e.g. kitchen work); serving one's master unsparingly
薪水給与令: (しんすいきゅうよれい) - Order for the Provision of Firewood and Water
薪炭: (しんたん) - wood and charcoal; fuel
薪能: (たきぎのう) - noh theater performed at night by a fire
薫: (kun/kao) - fragrant , pleasant smell, aroma, fragrance, scent; pleasant-smelling vegetation
薫き物: (たきもの) - mixture of frangrant woods, etc. used for making incense
薫らす: (くゆらす) - to smoke (e.g. pipe); to puff (cigarette)
薫る: (かおる) - to smell sweet; to be fragrant
薫化: (くんか) - influencing people by one's virtue
薫煙: (くんえん) - fragrant smoke; aromatic smoke
薫物: (たきもの) - mixture of frangrant woods, etc. used for making incense
薫育: (くんいく) - moral influence; moral education
薫蒸消毒: (くんじょうしょうどく) - fumigation
薫製: (kunsei) - smoked food, smoking (peixe, carne, etc.); smoked
薬: (remédio/medicamento) - medicine , medicine, pharmaceuticals, (legal) drugs, pill, ointment, salve; efficacious chemical (gunpowder, pesticide, etc.); (pottery) glaze; (illegal) drug, narcotic
薬が効く: (やくがきく) - to have medicine be effective
薬になる: (くすりになる) - to be beneficial (to); to do (a person) good
薬の代: (くすりのしろ) - cost of medicine
薬の力: (くすりのちから) - efficacy of a drug
薬より養生: (くすりよりようじょう) - Prevention is better than cure
薬を付ける: (くすりをつける) - to apply medicine
薬を合わせる: (くすりをあわせる) - to compound a medicine
薬を打つ: (やくをうつ) - to inject a unit of dope
薬九層倍: (くすりくそうばい) - (yoji) "There is a huge markup in medicines."
薬事監視員: (やくじかんしいん) - pharmaceutical inspector
薬価: (やくか) - National Health Insurance drug price; NHI drug price
薬傷: (やくしょう) - chemical burn; chemical injury
薬剤耐性菌: (やくざいたいせいきん) - drug-resistant bacterium; drug-resistant bacteria
薬効: (やっこう) - efficacy of a drug or medicine
薬効物: (やっこうぶつ) - medically effective ingredient
薬包紙: (やくほうし) - paper for wrapping powdered medicine
薬名: (やくめい) - name of a drug or medicine
薬味: (やくみ) - condiment (e.g. grated or chopped topping such as daikon, wasabi, ginger, green onion, red pepper); spice
薬味皿: (やくみざら) - plate for compounding condiments; small dish for serving condiments
薬味酒: (やくみしゅ) - medicinal drink made from plants steeped in mirin
薬品会社: (やくひんがいしゃ) - pharmaceutical company
薬学部: (やくがくぶ) - pharmaceutical department; college of pharmacy
薬害: (やくがい) - harmful side effects of a medicine or drug
薬害ヤコブ病訴訟: (やくがいヤコブびょうそしょう) - Japanese lawsuit involving cases where hospitalized patients contracted Creutzfeld-Jakob disease from infected transplants
薬屋: (くすりや) - pharmacy; chemist; drug store
薬師如来: (やくしにょらい) - Bhaisajyaguru (buddha able to cure all ills)
薬店: (やくてん) - pharmacy (esp. one without facilities to prepare their own medicines); drugstore; chemist
薬指: (くすりゆび) - ring finger; fourth finger
薬業界: (やくぎょうかい) - pharmaceutical industry; medicine industry
